name: calendars_get_earning_calendar
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trading_view.
Tool description: This API helps you to query for data which is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs to create a financial community site/application, such as : tradingview.com
API description: Fetches the earnings calendar for a specified date range and stock exchange.

is_from.description: The starting epoch timestamp in seconds (e.g., 1661187600).

to.description: The ending epoch timestamp in seconds (e.g., 1661619600).

lang.description: The language code for the response (default is 'en').

screenername.description: The screener name value returned in the /countries/list endpoint (default is 'america').
